snippet.title: 'Mamoris' chair doubles as a helmet
snippet.description: Meet a multitasking chair from earthquake-prone Japan. You can sit in it and, if needed, use it to protect your head from falling debris.

snippet.title: 'Star Trek' captain's chair on eBay hosted tons of celebrity buns
snippet.description: Everyone from Walter Koenig to Weird Al Yankovic has sat in a replica "Star Trek: The Next Generation" captain's chair now up for auction.

snippet.title: Forge a 'Game of Thrones' Iron Throne from a plastic lawn chair
snippet.description: Make your friends quiver with fear as you lord over the kingdom from your very own Iron Throne made from a lawn chair.

snippet.title: Self-assembling foam chair expands like popcorn
snippet.description: Belgian designer Carl de Smet has created a memory foam chair that assembles itself when heated.

snippet.title: FCC chair to TV broadcasters: Mobile is not your enemy
snippet.description: Is the wireless industry a wolf in sheep's clothing to the TV market? FCC Chairman Julius Genachowski says, "no," as he encourages TV broadcasters to work with wireless operators.

snippet.title: Strap yourself into the Stig Chair
snippet.description: This high-end chair draws inspiration from The Stig, a legendary character from the BBC's long-running "Top Gear" car TV show.

snippet.title: 'Game of Thrones' chair made from melted keyboards
snippet.description: The Throne of Nerds embodies the angst and struggle of ruling the kingdom in a chair crafted from the keyboards of fallen foes.

snippet.title: Crave Ep. 118: Memory foam chair expands when hot
snippet.description: This week, we sit in a chair that expands when things get hot and take a ride in a solar-powered scooter -- wearing a Predator Helmet, of course.

snippet.title: Memory foam chair expands when hot, Ep. 118
snippet.description: A Belgian artist has invented a memory foam chair that expands when heated up. We take a look at a solar-powered scooter and try on the Predator Helmet for size. All that and more on this week's super futuristic episode of Crave.

snippet.title: DRM Chair self-destructs after just eight uses
snippet.description: Chair designed for global project brings the concept of digital rights management into the physical world.
